channel.title: Prajwals Blog
channel.description: Hi I'm Prajwal, and this is my blog. Here, I share through my writing my experience as a Computer science student and everything I'm learning about on React, Typescript, Go, Serverless, System Design and Testing.

item.title: Turning 21
item.description: In this blog post, I share my thoughts and feelings as I celebrate my 21st birthday. Join me as I reflect on my journey so far, the expectations I had as a child, and the realization that I am now entering adulthood. I ponder what my younger self would think of the person I have become, and I express gratitude for the incredible people and experiences that have shaped my life. Come along as I navigate the excitement and nostalgia that come with turning 21.
item.content:encoded: In this blog post, I share my thoughts and feelings as I celebrate my 21st birthday. Join me as I reflect on my journey so far, the expectations I had as a child, and the realization that I am now entering adulthood. I ponder what my younger self would think of the person I have become, and I express gratitude for the incredible people and experiences that have shaped my life. Come along as I navigate the excitement and nostalgia that come with turning 21.

item.title: What I learnt from writing low level code for a semester
item.description: Low-level programming is a style of computer programming in which little or no abstraction is used between the instructions in the programming language and the architecture's machine code instructions. Low-level programming is the opposite of high-level programming, which uses a large amount of abstraction to make the process of developing a program easier.
item.content:encoded: Low-level programming is a style of computer programming in which little or no abstraction is used between the instructions in the programming language and the architecture's machine code instructions. Low-level programming is the opposite of high-level programming, which uses a large amount of abstraction to make the process of developing a program easier.
item.author: prajwalprakash3722@gmail.com (Prajwal P)

item.title: Heroku Alternatives
item.description: However, Heroku is not the only PaaS platform out there. In this article, we will look at some of the best Heroku alternatives as it has announced to stop supporting the free tier (hobby) plan from November 28th 2022.You can read more about this [here](https://blog.heroku.com/next-chapter/). I still remember the first time I deployed an application on Heroku, It was so easy to deploy. It was a simple Flask application that I had cloned from [hastebin](https://hastebin.com/), I still think its deployed somewhere on Heroku. [hastebin-clone](https://haste-bin-clone.herokuapp.com/) It literally deployed any code I threw at it that too for free. I was amazed at how easy it was to deploy an application on Heroku.It was essiential to any developer starting out. Earlier in the days it was not easy to run code on server, it required a special set of knowledge and skills to run code on a server.
item.content:encoded: However, Heroku is not the only PaaS platform out there. In this article, we will look at some of the best Heroku alternatives as it has announced to stop supporting the free tier (hobby) plan from November 28th 2022.You can read more about this [here](https://blog.heroku.com/next-chapter/). I still remember the first time I deployed an application on Heroku, It was so easy to deploy. It was a simple Flask application that I had cloned from [hastebin](https://hastebin.com/), I still think its deployed somewhere on Heroku. [hastebin-clone](https://haste-bin-clone.herokuapp.com/) It literally deployed any code I threw at it that too for free. I was amazed at how easy it was to deploy an application on Heroku.It was essiential to any developer starting out. Earlier in the days it was not easy to run code on server, it required a special set of knowledge and skills to run code on a server.
item.author: prajwalprakash3722@gmail.com (Prajwal P)

item.title: Don't get confused between map() and forEach()
item.description: JavaScript is the one of the easiest langauge to learn and as well as the most confusing langauge ever. I have been using JavaScript for more than 2 years and I have missed out of a fair share of features. One of the most common mistakes I have seen is people (including me) using map() and forEach() wrong. Now JavaScript offers us two methods to iterate over an array, `map()` and `forEach()`.
item.content:encoded: JavaScript is the one of the easiest langauge to learn and as well as the most confusing langauge ever. I have been using JavaScript for more than 2 years and I have missed out of a fair share of features. One of the most common mistakes I have seen is people (including me) using map() and forEach() wrong. Now JavaScript offers us two methods to iterate over an array, `map()` and `forEach()`.
item.author: prajwalprakash3722@gmail.com (Prajwal P)

item.title: Why I Prefer Type-Script more than JavaScript …?
item.description: If you have experience with JS you know that the data type is completely dynamic, to give you a example, I declare arr` as a const , and try to apply arr.map()` function, This is a error because arr` is not a array to map through and we’ll get to know this error during run (JS doesn’t need any compiling we can directly run / interpret it in Browser) time which is more frustrating for a developer
item.content:encoded: If you have experience with JS you know that the data type is completely dynamic, to give you a example, I declare arr` as a const , and try to apply arr.map()` function, This is a error because arr` is not a array to map through and we’ll get to know this error during run (JS doesn’t need any compiling we can directly run / interpret it in Browser) time which is more frustrating for a developer

item.title: The Respect !!!
item.description: Sir, It has been around 10 years, Since we came to Bengaluru.When me and my wife came here I had only 1000 rupees in my hand, I worked some odd jobs and saved enough money to open this hotel back in 5–6 years, Since then my life has been going good, My children are studying

item.title: Let's Talk Money: You've Worked Hard for It, Now Make It Work for You
item.description: Do you know why most sports athletes go broke just after few years of retiring ? They almost retire with 250% more than the net worth of a common man. still go broke. The main reason Is Poor Finance Planning!!

item.title: How Lucky Are We……?
item.description: F*** this Covid, I thought to myself, having cursed the pandemic countless times. This time wasn’t that much different. If it wasn’t for the pandemic, I would have had a blissful college life.

item.title: The Silent Struggle
item.description: Hearing aids are just a medium that connects us to the outer world. They are an integral part of my life; I do not go anywhere without them. I got introduced to this world on July 3rd 2002 and was declared deaf within 5 months.
item.content:encoded: Hearing aids are just a medium that connects us to the outer world. They are an integral part of my life; I do not go anywhere without them. I got introduced to this world on July 3rd 2002 and was declared deaf within 5 months.

item.title: Rich Dad Poor Dad: Assets and Liability management
item.description: It encourages you to invest in real estate, and there if you make a loss it teaches how to be not sad about losing the money instead of taking it as a lesson for future investments. It gives you simple explanations of how money works. It will not give you any trading tips, but it helps you understand the things no one teaches us in the school or at home. The financial insights aid you to take action, and be your boss.
item.content:encoded: It encourages you to invest in real estate, and there if you make a loss it teaches how to be not sad about losing the money instead of taking it as a lesson for future investments. It gives you simple explanations of how money works. It will not give you any trading tips, but it helps you understand the things no one teaches us in the school or at home. The financial insights aid you to take action, and be your boss.
